examples.korean: He outlived his wife by three years. 발음듣기 그는 아내보다 3년 더 살았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He outlived his wife by three years. 발음

examples.korean: He has recently parted from his wife. 발음듣기 그는 최근에 아내와 헤어졌다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He has recently parted from his wife. 발음

examples.korean: He was utterly bereft when his wife died. 발음듣기 아내가 죽었을 때 그는 완전히 상실감에 빠졌다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He was utterly bereft when his wife died. 발음

examples.korean: His wife, unhappily, died five years ago. 발음듣기 그의 아내는 불행히도 5년 전에 죽었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: His wife, unhappily, died five years ago. 발음

examples.korean: He was abetted in the deception by his wife. 발음듣기 그는 아내의 사주로 그 사기를 쳤다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He was abetted in the deception by his wife. 발음
